minions.name: Supreme Overlord
minions.description: You may return a minion to its owner's hand

minions.name: Scout
minions.description: Special: After this base scores, you may place this minion into your hand instead of the discard pile

minions.name: Collector
minions.description: You may return a minion of power 3 or less on this base to its owner's hand

actions.name: Abduction
actions.description: Return a minion to its owner's hand. Play an extra minion

actions.name: Beam Up
actions.description: Return a minion to its owner's hand

actions.name: Crop Circles
actions.description: Choose a base. Return each minion on that base to its owner's hand

actions.name: Disintegrator
actions.description: Place a minion of power 3 or less on the bottom of its owner's deck

actions.name: Invasion
actions.description: Move a minion to another base

actions.name: Jammed Signal
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: All players ignore this base's ability

actions.name: Probe
actions.description: Look at another player's hand and choose a minion in it. That player discards that minion

actions.name: Terraforming
actions.description: Search the base deck for a base. Swap it with a base in play (discard all actions attached to it). Shuffle the base deck. You may play an extra minion on the new base
